DOC.brief_title: A Randomized , Double-blind Clinical Trial Evaluate Safety Efficacy X5 HairLaser Treatment Androgenetic Alopecia Males

Has active skin infection scalp area scar target area . Has photosensitivity laser light . Has use Accutane previous year . Has history poor wound heal . Has history keloid formation . Has know history anticoagulant antiplatelet use . Has use currently take follow medication six month prior screen : finasteride ( 5areductase inhibitor medication ) , medication antiandrogenic property , topical estrogen , progesterone , tamoxifen , anabolic steroid , medication potential cause hypertrichosis , oral glucocorticoid , lithium , phenothiazine , medication discretion investigator Has use currently take Minoxidil 12 month prior screen . Has `` buzz '' cut hairstyle , define hair cut le one inch length . Has light blond , light gray white hair , discretion investigator . Has hair transplant , scalp reduction , current hair weave tattoo target area , make difficult perform hair count assessment . Has ever receive radiation therapy scalp , chemotherapy past year .
